Title: Hotel Management System
ImgAlt: A image of the hotel management application
About: The Hotel Booking System is a minimal web-based application that allows users to search and book. It provides an Razor Pages web interface for customers to book available rooms and an desktop application for hotel staff to perform booking validation and check-in.
Challenges: The main challenges included designing an efficient booking workflow, synchronizing data between the web and desktop apps, and handling booking conflicts. Optimizing database queries with Dapper.

Title: Chess Game
ImgAlt: A image of the chess game
About: Developing a WPF desktop chess application that allows two players to play on the same computer, focusing on building strong game logic to demonstrate problem-solving and programming skills. The application uses coordinate-based calculations to validate piece movements and enforce chess rules, while a dynamic chessboard UI built with WPF Grid and C# renders pieces and updates the board in real-time. Additional features include highlighting possible moves and sound effects.
Challenges: Implementing the entire game logic based on coordinate calculations and rendering a dynamic chessboard UI in WPF, while ensuring interactive features like possible moves highlighting and sound effects worked correctly.
